name: Autonmous Machine Part
description: A bundle of components essential in any advance crafting machine.
A large processing unit on an electric board. An essential component to BioCo machines.
name: BioCo AutoDoc Core
Pristine Bionic Components
description: A collection of top quality machine to human interfaces, advance semiconductors, and other important components to BioCo tech. Useful in both bionics and advance electronics.
